articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Speech at 5th Conference of WPK Cell Chairpersons
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Speech at 5th Conference of WPK Cell Chairpersons
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a historic speech "Let Us Strengthen Party Cells into Loyal Cells, into Vanguard Ranks for the Implementation of the Party's Policies" at the third-day meeting of the 5th Conference of the WPK Cell Chairpersons on December 23.
					 Noting that successes and experience gained in the work of the Party cells after the Forth Conference of the WPK Cell Secretaries and defects existing or betrayed in their work were correctly analyzed and reviewed at the current conference, Kim Jong Un said the conference offered an important occasion in fixing a right orientation in the future efforts for further strengthening the Party cells.
					
					 Stressing that the WPK is now faced with the tasks to attain the higher goal for building a powerful socialist nation advanced at the 7th WPK Congress by enhancing its guiding ability and working efficiency under the unfurled banner of modeling the entire Party on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, he said lower-echelon Party organizations, notably the Party cells, should further their function and role and launch positive activities in order to successfully carry out the important tasks facing the Party.
					
					 To strengthen the Party cells is a main link in the chain efforts for consolidating the mass foundation of the Party and enhancing the guiding role and working efficiency of the Party, he noted, adding:
					
					 To strengthen the Party cells at present is an urgent requirement for accelerating the victorious advance of the cause of building a powerful socialist country despite all trials and challenges.
					
					 All Party cells should hold high the slogan "Let Us Strengthen Party Cells into Loyal Cells, into Vanguard Ranks for the Implementation of the Party's Policies!"
					
					 Whether to strengthen the Party cells as planned and intended by the Party Central Committee or not entirely hinges on the role of the cell chairpersons.
					
					 The working efficiency of the Party cells has been further strengthened and lots of improvements have been witnessed in the traits and working style of the cell chairpersons since the Fourth Conference of the WPK Cell Secretaries but the working style, power of execution and activities of the party cells have not yet reached the level wanted by the Party Central Committee.
					
					 The Party cell chairpersons should strengthen the organization and guidance over the party life with main emphasis on the work to firmly prepare all party members of the cells to be steadfast revolutionaries, true Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists.
					
					 They should direct their primary attention to strengthening the ideological life of the party members and deepen the five-point education.
					
					 They should meticulously guide and control the organizational life of the party members with main emphasis on the work to thoroughly establish the Party's unified leadership system and enhance the spirit of the party members.
					
					 They should strengthen self-criticism and criticism among the party members so as to actively combat all unsound practices.
					
					 There can not be a special person in the party life and the double standards of discipline should never be allowed in the party cells, he noted, stressing the need for the party cells to which officials belong to make a strict demand for the party life of officials so that they may take a sincere part in the party life with the attitude of ordinary party members and work in high-tension atmosphere under the education and control by party organizations.
					
					 He also underlined the need for the party cell chairpersons to concentrate efforts of the party cell work on strengthening party cells into the vanguard ranks for the implementation of the Party's policies.
					
					 He called upon the party cell chairpersons to put main emphasis of the party cell work at present on implementing the decisions of the Second Plenary Meeting of the 7th Party Central Committee and attaining the goals of the five-year strategy for national economic development and to arouse all the party members and other working people to the drive for carrying out them.
					
					 He stressed the need for them to encourage all the party members and other working people to overcome difficulties and ordeals and bring about an upswing in production in the fighting spirit of self-reliance and fortitude with a firm conviction of sure victory and confidence in their own strength as required by the prevailing situation.
					
					 He underscored the need to make the work with people the one with their minds and feelings in order to give full play to the collective innovations and popular heroism in carrying out the Party's policies and the revolutionary tasks.
					
					 The party cell chairpersons should make positive efforts to grasp the traits of primary political officials of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party and the revolutionary mass work method, he said.
					
					 He referred to non-socialist practices harmful to defending our-style socialism at present, and stressed that they occurred because the party organizations, working people's organizations and officials failed to persistently conduct education among the party members and other working people and intensify ideological struggle.
					
					 Underscoring the need for conducting revolutionary offensive to uproot non-socialist practices, he said the offensive should be launched in the party cells, the bases educating the party members and other working people and training them into revolutionaries and the lowest revolutionary posts defending Korean-style socialism.
					
					 We should make genuine moral principles and our style advantageous socialist morality in which all people respect each other, repose trust, cooperate with each other and help ailing and disabled persons and those with difficulties, sharing pleasure and sorrow, enjoying happy and affluent life and advancing altogether, prevail in the whole society, he said. 
					
					 When our socialist culture and art prevails over the corrupt bourgeois reactionary culture, it is possible for people not to harbor illusions about the enemies' culture but to prevent ideological and cultural poisoning by the imperialists, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The entire party should prioritize the party cells and direct main efforts to improving their work.
					
					 The party committees at all levels should build well the ranks of party cell chairpersons and exert efforts to improve their political and practical qualifications.
					
					 The issues arising in enhancing the militant function and role of the party cells should be reflected in the working plans of the party committees, and party officials should personally go into the party cells to help them.
					
					 The work to make loyal party cells should be dynamically pushed ahead and the party leadership should be deepened so that the loyal party cells can hold fast to and continuously glorify their honor.
					
					 To strengthen party cells means to strengthen our party and the role of party cells leads to the guiding ability and working efficiency of our party. 
					
					 Let all of us work hard to strengthen the WPK and achieve the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, being conscious of the mission we assume before the party and the revolution, the chairman of the WPK stated.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Closing Address at 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Closing Address at 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, guided the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK held from Dec. 21 to 23 amid the deep concern and expectation of all party members and other people of the country, and made a closing address.
					 Kim Jong Un said that the conference was successfully held thanks to the high enthusiasm of all the participants, adding that the Conference set forth proper orientation of struggle for the subsequent period before coming to a closure.
					
					 He said that the conference recalled the position held by party cells in strengthening the party and putting into practice the party's idea and intention, and the importance of duties assumed by party cell chairpersons, adding the conference clarified tasks and ways for strengthening the party cells at present.
					
					 The conference would offer an important occasion in further enhancing the function and role of the party cells as required by the prevailing situation and the developing revolution and in strengthening the leadership and militant ability of the party, he stressed.
					
					 The basic spirit of the conference is to turn all party cells into loyal cells, vanguard ranks implementing the party policies and bring about a fresh turn in the drive for strengthening the party and building a socialist power, he added.
					
					 Noting that it is heavy yet responsible work to strengthen the party cells into loyal cells and vanguard ranks of implementing party policies, he said with confidence that when all party chairpersons turn out with redoubled efforts, being conscious of the mission and duties assumed by them as primary political officials of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party, the party cells would be strengthened, the militant power of our party would grow stronger and our revolution would make faster advance.
					
					 He stressed the need for all the cell chairpersons of the whole party to refresh determination and harden fighting spirit with the conference as momentum, to devote strength, wisdom and enthusiasm to rallying the party members and other working people close around the party, to become vanguard fighters and true educators of the popular masses who are making the breakthrough in the van whenever they are faced with difficulties and hardships and to arouse the masses into implementing the party policies.
					
					 It is the traditional fighting mode of the WPK to strengthen the party cells, militant units directly in charge of carrying out the party policies, enhance the leadership role of the party and effect a surge in the revolution and construction, he said, adding that our party will invariably carry forward this tradition in the future, too, and keep putting big efforts into prioritizing party cells and strengthening them.
					
					 He called on party organizations at all levels and party officials to cherish the party's idea and policies on prioritizing party cells and devote all efforts into strengthening all party cells into faithful cells and vanguard ranks implementing the party policies.
					
					 He said with pride that even though we may face manifold difficulties and hardships in the ways ahead, the Party Central Committee feels reassured as there are hundreds of thousands of cell chairpersons, core members loyal to the party and vanguard fighters for carrying out the party policies, and millions of party members.
					
					 What we have done is just the beginning and the Party Central Committee plans to conduct more new projects for the people, he said, noting it will to courageously carry out operations in a big and bold way for building a socialist power with trust put in party cell chairpersons.
					
					 He stressed that the participants in the conference should cherish deep once again what heavy responsibility they have assumed before the party and the revolution and at what an important post they are working.
					
					 Expressing conviction that all the party cell chairpersons will cherish the spirit of the conference and put it into their practical work to surely repay the trust and expectation of the Party Central Committee, he declared the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the WPK closed.

articles.title: 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK Closes
articles.content:
5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK Closes
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the Workers' Party of Korea closed Saturday.
					 Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un, together with members of the Executive Policy Council of the WPK Central Committee, took the platform to guide the third-day meeting of the Conference.
					
					 Also taking the platform were leading officials of the central and provincial party committees.
					
					 The Conference continued under the guidance of the chairman of the WPK
					
					 Speakers referred to the achievements, experience and lessons drawn in the course of preparing party members and other working people to be true Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists and enhancing the function and role of party cells.
					
					 Defects and shortcomings that occurred in the work of enhancing the function and role of the party cells were criticized and substantial measures were pressed for to raise the role of party cell chairpersons in building all the party cells into faithful ranks upholding the ideology and leadership of the Party Central Committee in the van.
					
					 Evinced at the Conference were resolutions to cherish the intention of the Party Central Committee which convened the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the WPK, raise the role of party cell chairpersons and thus make active contributions to realizing the cause of modeling the entire party and the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and give a powerful impetus to the building of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a historic speech at the Conference.
					
					 As his speech was over, all the participants broke into warm cheers.
					
					 He made a closing address.

articles.title: Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK on Sunday issued the following statement:
					 The United States, completely terrified at our accomplishment of the great historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, is getting more and more frenzied in the moves to impose the harshest-ever sanctions and pressure on our country.
					
					 On December 23, the U.S., while denouncing our successful test launch of ICBM Hwasong-15, cooked up once again the UN Security Council "sanctions resolution" 2397 which is tantamount to complete economic blockade of the DPRK.
					
					 We define this "sanctions resolution" rigged up by the U.S. and its followers as a grave infringement upon the sovereignty of our Republic, as an act of war violating peace and stability in the Korean peninsula and the region and categorically reject the "resolution".
					
					 The reason we have achieved the great cause of completing the state nuclear force, overcoming all kinds of hardships and weathering through manifold difficulties is to safeguard the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the country, ensure the peaceful life of the people and reliably guarantee peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the world against the nuclear blackmail policy and nuclear threats of the U.S imperialists.
					
					 As we have stated several times, our nuclear weapons are self-defensive deterrence that does not contradict any international law  since we have developed and completed them in a fair and legitimate way outside of the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons in order to put an end to the hostile policy and nuclear threats and blackmail of the U.S.
					
					 It is a philosophical truth we have found through the past showdown with the U.S. that strengthening the powerful nuclear deterrence in every way is the only way to frustrate the moves of the U.S. who makes it its daily business to carry on military threats and blackmail in every region to realize its preposterous dream of hegemony over the world, advocating the "America First Policy" based on force.
					
					 There is no more fatal blunder than the miscalculation that the U.S. and its followers could check by already worn-out "sanctions" the victorious advance of our people who have brilliantly accomplished the great historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power capable of coping with any nuclear war against the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. should not forget even a second the entity of the DPRK which rapidly emerged as a strategic state capable of posing a substantial nuclear threat to the U.S. mainland.
					
					 If the U.S. wishes to live safely, it must abandon its hostile policy towards the DPRK and learn to co-exist with the country that has nuclear weapons and should wake up from its pipe dream of our country giving up nuclear weapons which we have developed and completed through all kinds of hardships.
					
					 Those countries that raised their hands in favor of this "sanctions resolution" shall be held completely responsible for all the consequences to be caused by the "resolution" and we will make sure for ever and ever that they pay heavy price for what they have done.
					
					 Whatever difficulties and challenges lie ahead of our road of advance, we neither feel disappointed nor are afraid of them but are optimistic about brighter future, and no force in the world can break our people's indomitable spirit.
					
					 We will further consolidate our self-defensive nuclear deterrence aimed at fundamentally eradicating the U.S. nuclear threats, blackmail and hostile moves by establishing the practical balance of force with the U.S.
					
					 No matter how crazy the U.S. and the hostile forces become in their maneuvers against our country, our Republic that advances with the great power of the invincible single-minded unity around the great leader, the strongest military force and the self-reliance and self-development will always shine as the powerful country and the fortress of independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in defense.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Centenary of Birth of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Centenary of Birth of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture here on Sunday to mark the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, teachers and students of the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, officials and labor innovators of institutions and industrial establishments in the city.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and vice-president of the Presidium of the SPA, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk's life was the noblest one of a great revolutionary who dedicated her all to the prosperity and rosy future of the country and the nation, the reporter said, adding:
					
					 The human history recorded a large number of famous women revolutionaries but has not known such a prominent woman revolutionary and genuine patriot as Kim Jong Suk who performed so great and precious exploits.
					
					 Her distinguished feat is that she set a noble example and tradition of loyalty to the leader that the Korean revolutionaries should acquire and apply generation after generation.
					
					 Her immortal exploits for the country and the revolution can be found in the fact that she made great contributions to liberating the country with arms, true to the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, and laying a solid military foundation for building a prosperous country.
					
					 In the days when an untrodden path of building a country was paved, she had worked heart and soul to arouse all the people to building of a new country true to Kim Il Sung's idea and intention.
					
					 Her greatest exploit is that she brought up leader Kim Jong Il as the rising sun and thus gave the people the highest honor and happiness of being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 The reporter stressed that the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Suk who dedicated her all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people would remain forever along with the cause of building a powerful socialist nation of Juche.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK laid floral baskets at the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of Dec. 24.
					 Seen before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here was a basket of flowers from respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Placed at the statues were floral baskets in the names of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions at all levels, industrial establishments and schools and other units in Pyongyang.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the great leaders.
					
					 Floral baskets in the names of KPA units and institutions and industrial establishments and other units were placed at the statues of the great leaders in different parts of the city including the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Servicepersons, working citizens and school youths and children in different parts of the country paid floral tribute to the statues of the great leaders and their smiling portraits in their residential areas.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid at Bust of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid at Bust of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were placed before the bust of Kim Jong Sun, the anti-Japanese war heroine, at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong on Sunday, the centenary of her birth.
					 Seen there was a wreath from respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Pak Yong Sik, Choe Pu Il, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Ju O and other senior state and army officials, officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working citizens in Pyongyang.
					
					 Laid at the bust were wreaths in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Also placed were wreaths in the names of armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, educational and public health organs and party and power bodies, factories and other units in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Suk, recollecting her revolutionary career.
					
					 On the same day, floral baskets were laid at the statues of Kim Jong Suk in Hoeryong City, Kim Jong Suk County, Kim Jong Suk Naval University and other parts of the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, the members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited her bust at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong.

articles.title: Seminar of Social Scientists Marks Centenary of Birth of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Seminar of Social Scientists Marks Centenary of Birth of Kim Jong Suk
 Hoeryong, December 24 (KCNA) -- A seminar of social scientists took place in Hoeryong City, North Hamgyong Province on Sunday to mark the centenary of birth of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Attending it were researchers, teachers, journalists and lecturers in the fields of science, education, preservation of revolutionary relics and media and party cadre training institutions.
					
					 Presented to it were papers on the revolutionary life and exploits of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Suk upheld the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung throughout her revolutionary life and created noble example and tradition of loyalty to the leader.
					
					 What constituted the core of her military traits and disposition as the woman commander of Mt Paektu were her rare military wisdom, outstanding strategy, bold spirit and matchless bravery and mysterious marksmanship, they said, adding:
					
					 She was a distinguished woman political activist who developed the Korean women's movement into the Juche-based women's movement in which Kim Il Sung's idea and leadership have been firmly established.
					
					 Her feats are deeply cherished in the minds of the Korean people to shine century after century, they stressed.
					
					 They made pledges to glorify the revolutionary life and exploits of Kim Jong Suk and bring about a surge in implementing the tasks set forth in the 2nd plenary session of the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Marked in Hoeryong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Marked in Hoeryong
 Hoeryong, December 24 (KCNA) -- A concert "Eternal sunray of loyalty" took place at the Hoeryong Schoolchildren's Palace on Dec. 24, the centenary of birth of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Among the audience were Pak Chol Min, first secretary of the C.C., Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, Choe Sung Il, vice-chairman of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the youth league and youth and students in Hoeryong City.
					
					 Included in the numbers of the concert, which began with narrative poem and chorus "Kim Jong Suk Is Our Mother", were female trio "Memory of the Native Home" and narration and mixed quartet "The General Is the Destiny of Korea".
					
					 Performers impressively represented Kim Jong Suk's personality as a great person.

articles.title: Performances Given to Mark National Holidays
articles.content:
Performances Given to Mark National Holidays
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- There took place colorful art performances at theatres in Pyongyang and provinces on Sunday to mark the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Central art troupes gave celebration performances in Pyongyang.
					
					 Concert "Nostalgia" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre and a performance "Eternal Mother of Revolution" at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre by the female chorus of the Mansudae Art Troupe.
					
					 A drama "Woman Comrade of Mt Paektu" was staged at the National Theatre and a revolutionary opera "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight" and a dance suite "Our Golden Country" at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the Ponghwa Art Theatre.
					
					 Circus and magic performances were given at the Pyongyang Circus Theater and the jugglery theatre of the National Acrobatic Troupe.
					
					 The Ryanggang Provincial Art Troupe gave a revolutionary opera "With Sunshine" which deals with the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Similar performances were also given in other provinces

articles.title: Dancing Party of Youths Marks DPRK Holidays
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Youths Marks DPRK Holidays
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in various parts of the country Sunday to mark the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the centenary of birth of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 In the capital city of Pyongyang, they began their dancing parties in the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, and the Arch of Triumph and other parts of the city amid the playing of the song "Fortune of Korea".
					
					 They danced to the tune of such songs as "Our General Is the Best" and "Unforgettable Echoes over Lagoon Samil", expressing the highest respects and eternal glory to Kim Jong Il and deep reverence for Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Similar events were held in provincial seats, cities and counties.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Judges' Act for Revival of Conservatism Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Judges' Act for Revival of Conservatism Flailed
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Sin Kwang Ryol, a judge of the Seoul Central District Court of south Korea, set free former puppet Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin and former policy section chief Im Kwang Bin, who had been detained as key manipulators behind the misleading of the public opinion by the Cyber Command of the puppet army, asserting that there is no concern of having evidence destroyed. In its wake Kang Pu Yong, a judge in charge of warrant affairs, declined the warrant of arrest for Kim Thae Hyo, former secretary for foreign strategy of Chongwadae who is a close confidant of traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					 Earlier, judge O Min Sok and judge in charge of warrant affairs Kang Pu Yong also declined the warrant of arrest for Chu Son Hui, former secretary general of ultra-right conservative group Oboi Association, and Kim Jae Chol, former director general of MBC Broadcasting Corporation who played a key role in Lee Myung Bak group's activities for putting broadcasting field under their control.
					
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Sunday says the criminal act of the die-hard conservative judges of releasing one after another the accomplices of traitor Lee Myung Bak under unreasonable pretexts is an open denial and an outright challenge to the public mindset of south Korea for the abolition of evils of the conservative regime.
					
					 The case of making blacklist against progressive personages and politicians and the case of misleading the public opinion by mobilizing the puppet Intelligence Service and the Cyber Command of the puppet army and all other hideous crimes committed by Lee Myung Bak and his group have been undeniably proven, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The dishonest act of the judges with proclivity of standing for conservatism while defending Lee Myung Bak group and obstructing the abolition of evils is a vivid expression of the desperate moves of the conservative group of traitors to raise their head again for revival.
					
					 If the conservative-minded judges in alignment with the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are left intact, the demand of south Koreans from all walks of life for the abolition of evils can become meaningless echoes and it will entail such disastrous consequences as undermining the gains won by candlelight struggle.

articles.title: Shutdown of Bio-Chemical Laboratories in U.S. Military Bases Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Shutdown of Bio-Chemical Laboratories in U.S. Military Bases Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online newspaper Voice of People carried an editorial titled "Secret promotion of the bio-chemical laboratory at the U.S. military base in Phyongtaek is the worst infringement upon sovereignty."
					 The editorial disclosed that a bio-chemical laboratory for the "Jupiter Plan" was established at the U.S. military base in Pusan Port in Nov. 2015 and the similar laboratory secretly built at the U.S. military base in Phyongtaek.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. military base in Phyongtaek is located near civilian dwellings, it urged showdown of the above-said laboratories.

articles.title: Halt to Retrogressive Revision of Labor Law Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Retrogressive Revision of Labor Law Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo, the Headquarters for People's All-out Action and the Headquarters for Good Society for Trade Union held a news conference outside the building of the Minju Party of south Korea in Youido on Dec. 21 to denounce the ruling party for enforcing the retrogressive revision of the "Labor Standards Act" and demand the release of prisoners of conscience.
					 A press release said that they would no longer allow the present regime to continue the evil practices of the Park Geun Hye "government" but struggle for the rights of workers to the last.
					
					 On the same day the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a emergency rally in this regard.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Take Measure for Preventing Accident
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Take Measure for Preventing Accident
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The CBS of south Korea Friday censured the puppet authorities for having failed to take safety measure over the fire disaster occurred in Jechon City, North Chungcheong Province.
					 It charged that the chief executive recently stressed the responsibility of the authorities for the life and safety of the people but such tragedy occurred.
					
					 It urged the authorities to take a measure for preventing such accident.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian body and an Italian figure made public statements ahead of the sixth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Workers' United Trade Union of the Peruvian National Association for Children's Health in a statement on Dec. 16 paid high tribute to Kim Jong Il, stressing that he defended the destiny of the country and the people from the aggression moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers and had devotedly worked for the building of a prosperous and powerful country till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Flavio Pettinari, chief of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Fermo of Italy, in a statement on Dec. 15 noted that Kim Jong Il led the DPRK along the road of victory by pursuing the Songun politics based on the Juche idea.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership the DPRK turned into an invincible power capable of repelling any provocation by the U.S. imperialists, the statement said.

articles.title: Foreigners Blast U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Foreigners Blast U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Political parties and personages of different countries denounced the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK and supported the Korean people's struggle for bolstering up the military capability for self-defense between Dec. 2 and 12.
					 The Egyptian National Progress United Party in a statement said that nobody can prevent a nation exposed to the U.S. nuclear threat from having access to nuclear weapons, condemning the UNSC "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK for inflicting unimaginable damage on the Korean people.
					
					 A spokesman for the Party gave the following answer to a question put by a reporter of Al Sabia Newspaer on the DPRK issue:
					
					 We do not believe the wrong propaganda of the West against north Korea.
					
					 According to the official data, north Korea is very developed and it has power capable of standing the sanctions of the West.
					
					 Contrary to the West propaganda, north Korea is a united and stable country strong in creative ability.
					
					 The vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, in a commentary dedicated to the newspaper Hora do Povo, said that Trump's remarks that the DPRK poses a "threat to the world" are nothing but sophism.
					
					 The commentary noted that the "story of threat from north Korea" is no more than a pretext to invade the DPRK and realize their hegemonic ambition and this would get the U.S. isolated.
					
					 The secretary general of the Romanian Workers' Association in a statement strongly criticized the U.S. hostile policy aimed to trample on the DPRK's sovereignty and rights to existence and development.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Korean people have the legitimate right to take measures for self-defense. We extend firm support and solidarity to the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso en V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso en V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas de PTC
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, pronuncio el dia 23 en la tercera jornada de la V Conferencia de los Presidentes de las Celulas del PTC el discurso historico "Fortalezcamos las celulas del Partido como las fieles y las filas de vanguardias para el cumplimiento de las politicas del Partido".
					En el conclave, fueron analizados y balanceados correctamente los exitos y experiencias logrados y los defectos latentes o revelados en el trabajo de las celulas del Partido despues de la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de las Celulas del PTC, dijo el y continuo que esta conferencia sirvio de oportunidad importante para definir el correcto rumbo de lucha para reforzar mas en el futuro las celulas partidistas.
					
					Hoy dia, se presenta ante nuestro Partido la tarea de alcanzar la meta mas elevada de la construccion de potencia socialista, presentada en el VII Congreso del PTC, al incrementar el liderazgo y la combatividad del Partido bajo la bandera de la identificacion de todo el Partido con el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, apunto y prosiguio:
					
					Para cumplir exitosamente esa tarea importante, hace falta mejorar la funcion y el desempeno de las organizaciones de base del Partido, sobre todo, de las celulas partidistas y dinamizar sus actividades.
					
					Fortalecer las celulas del Partido constituye el eslabon fundamental para consolidar el terreno masivo de nuestro partido y elevar su papel directivo y poderio combativo.
					
					Y se presenta en la actualidad como demanda apremiante para acelerar el avance victorioso de la causa de construccion de potencia socialista superando todo tipo de pruebas y desafios.
					
					Las celulas de todo el Partido deben marchar adelante bajo la consigna "!Fortalezcamos las celulas del Partido como las fieles y las filas de vanguardias para el cumplimiento de las politicas del Partido!".
					
					Depende del desempeno de los presidentes de las celulas el fortalecimiento de estas unidades de base segun el proyecto y el proposito del Comite Central del Partido o el resultado contrario.
					
					Despues de la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de las Celulas, se reportaron un incremento en la combatividad de las celulas y mucha mejoria en las cualidades y el modo de trabajo de sus presidentes, pero la manera de trabajar, la capacidad ejecutiva y la actividad de ellas no alcanzan todavia el nivel deseado por el Comite Central del Partido.
					
					Los presidentes de las celulas del Partido deben intensificar la organizacion y la direccion de la vida partidista dando enfoque a formar a todos sus militantes como consecuentes revolucionarios y verdaderos kimilsungistas y kimjongilistas.
					
					Y deben prestar la atencion primordial a fortalecer la vida ideologica de los militantes e intensificar aun mas la educacion de 5 tipos.
					
					Han de establecer estrictamente el sistema de direccion unica del Partido y realizar con escrupulosidad la direccion y el control sobre la vida organizativa dando importancia a elevar el partidismo de los militantes.
					
					Les resulta imperioso intensificar la autocritica y la critica mutua entre los militantes y dinamizar la lucha contra todo tipo de fenomenos negativos.
					
					No puede haber figuras excepcionales en la vida partidista ni tolerar la dualidad en la disciplina de las celulas partidistas. Las celulas deben ser mas exigentes en cuanto a la vida partidista de los cuadros pertenecientes para que estos participen con sinceridad en la vida partidista con la posicion de militante comun del Partido y trabajen en estado tenso bajo la educacion y el control de la organizacion partidista.
					
					Los presidentes de las celulas deben concentrar sus trabajos en convertir sus unidades en las filas de vanguardias para la materializacion de las politicas del Partido.
					
					En la actualidad, les hace falta poner en el centro de sus trabajos la materializacion de la resolucion del segundo pleno del septimo periodo del CC del PTC y el cumplimiento de la meta de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional y movilizar a todos los militantes y trabajadores en la lucha para ese fin.
					
					De acuerdo con la demanda de la situacion dada, es preciso estimular a todos los militantes del Partido y los trabajadores a registrar un auge productivo haciendo uso del espiritu combativo de autoconfianza y perseverancia y superando las pruebas y dificultades con la confianza en la victoria segura y en las fuerzas propias.
					
					Para poner en pleno juego la innovacion colectiva y el heroismo masivo en el cumplimiento de las politicas partidistas y las tareas revolucionarias, hay que convertir el trabajo con la gente en la comunicacion con su alma y sentimiento.
					
					Los presidentes de las celulas partidistas deben esforzarse mucho por adquirir las cualidades de funcionario politico de base del Partido Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista y asimilar el revolucionario metodo de trabajo con las masas.
					
					Los fenomenos no socialistas, que surten ahora efectos nocivos en la defensa del socialismo al estilo coreano, se deben a que las organizaciones y los funcionarios del Partido y de las entidades de masas no han impulsado con constancia la educacion para los militantes del Partido y trabajadores ni aumentado la intensidad de la batalla de ideas.
					
					Se necesita una ofensiva revolucionaria de gran magnitud para erradicar esos fenomenos y ella debe comenzar desde las celulas, base de educacion y formacion de los militantes y trabajadores como los revolucionarios y puestos de base de la revolucion para defender el socialismo a nuestro estilo.
					
					Hay que hacer reinar en toda la sociedad la verdadera etica y la ventajosa moral socialista de nuestro estilo con que todos vivan respetando, confiando y cooperando uno con otro, ayuden a los enfermos, discapacitados y personas con escasez economica y marchen adelante y convivan feliz y comodamente compartiendo las buenas y las malas.
					
					Cuando la cultura y el arte de nuestro socialismo prevalezcan sobre la corrupta cultura reaccionaria de burguesia, las personas no abrigaran ilusiones sobre la cultura de los enemigos y se podra bloquear la infiltracion ideo-cultural de los imperialistas.
					
					Todo el Partido debe concentrarse en conceder importancia a las celulas y mejorar sus trabajos.
					
					A los comites del Partido de todos niveles les compete formar a buenos presidentes de las celulas y elevar su nivel politico y de trabajo. 
					
					Se debe plantear en el plan de trabajo de los comites del partido los problemas surgidos en elevar la funcion y papel de las celulas y tomar las medidas correspondientes. Y los funcionarios del partido tienen que ayudar a las celulas del Partido acudiendo personalmente a ellas.
					
					Hay que impulsar con dinamismo la campana para conquistar el honor de la celula fiel del partido y profundizar la direccion partidista sobre las que ya lo obtuvieron para que ellas mantuvieran esa honra.
					
					El fortalecimiento de las celulas del Partido es precisamente la consolidacion de nuestro partido y el papel de ellas determina la capacidad directiva y combativa de nuestro partido.
					
					Por ultimo, el Presidente del PTC llamo a todos los participantes a luchar energicamente por desarrollar el PTC y alcanzar la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, bien conscientes de sus compromisos con el partido y la revolucion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso de clausura en V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso de clausura en V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas de PTC
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, pronuncio el discurso de clausura tras dirigir la V Conferencia de los Presidentes de las Celulas del PTC, efectuada desde el dia 21 hasta el 23 de diciembre bajo la atencion especial y expectativas de todos los militantes del Partido y los habitantes del pais.
					Kim Jong Un dijo que la conferencia transcurrio con exito gracias al elevado entusiasmo de todos los participantes y concluye sus trabajos presentando el correcto rumbo de la lucha posterior.
					
					Senalo que el conclave volvio a recordar la posicion de las celulas partidistas en fortalecer el Partido y realizar su proyecto y proposito y la importancia de la mision asumida por los presidentes de ellas y presento claramente las tareas y remedios para consolidarlas en la epoca actual.
					
					Esta reunion marcara un hito importante para fortalecer el liderazgo y la combatividad del Partido al elevar aun mas la funcion y el papel de las celulas partidistas conforme a la situacion dada y la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo, subrayo.
					
					Continuo que el espiritu fundamental de la conferencia reside en imprimir nuevo viraje en la lucha por el fortalecimiento y desarrollo de partido y la construccion de una potencia socialista al convertir las celulas de todo el Partido en las filas fieles y vanguardistas en la materializacion de las politicas de la organizacion.
					
					Esa es una tarea importante y responsable, dijo y apunto con seguridad que cuando todos sus presidentes redoblen los esfuerzos teniendo presente su mision y deber de funcionario politico de base del partido kimilsungista-kimjongilista, se fortaleceran las celulas partidistas, se aumentara la combatividad de nuestro Partido y avanzara con mayor velocidad nuestra revolucion.
					
					Prosiguio que al renovar la disposicion e impetu a traves de esta conferencia, los presidentes de las celulas de todo el Partido deben trabajar con toda su fuerza, inteligencia y pasion para agrupar compactamente a todos los militantes y trabajadores en torno al Partido, desempenar el papel de vanguardistas cada vez que se les presente una tarea dificil y complicada y llamar a las masas a la materializacion de las politicas del Partido siendo verdaderos educadores de ellas.
					
					Consolidar las celulas partidistas, unidades directamente encargadas de implementar las politicas del Partido, para elevar el papel directivo de esta organizacion y registrar ascenso en la revolucion y la construccion son el tradicional modo de trabajo del PTC, enfatizo y anadio que nuestro Partido continuara siempre esta tradicion y seguira prestando profunda atencion a las cuestiones para apreciar y fortalecer las celulas.
					
					El Presidente del PTC enfatizo que bien conscientes de la idea y la orientacion de nuestro Partido de dar importancia a las celulas, las organizaciones de todos niveles y los funcionarios del Partido deberan poner empeno en fortalecerlas como las fieles y las filas vanguardistas en el cumplimiento de las politicas del partido.
					
					Dijo en tono orgulloso que aunque en nuestra ruta de avance hay muchos obstaculos y dificultades, el Comite Central del Partido se siente seguro y sereno porque cuenta con cientos de miles de presidentes de celulas, pilares fieles al Partido y vanguardistas de la materializacion de sus politicas, y con millones de militantes.
					
					Lo que hemos hecho hasta ahora no pasa de ser el comienzo y el Comite Central del Partido proyecta muchas obras nuevas para el pueblo, dijo y continuo que el desarrollara con mas audacia los proyectos ambiciosos para la construccion de una potencia socialista confiando en los companeros.
					
					A traves del presente conclave, los participantes deben volver a constatar cuan importantes son la responsabilidad que asumen ante el Partido y la revolucion y la posicion que ocupan, reitero.
					
					Convencido de que todos los presidentes de las celulas recompensaran sin falta la confianza y esperanza del Comite Central del Partido al asimilar y aplicar cabalmente en sus trabajos el espiritu de esta reunion, declaro clausurada la V Conferencia de los Presidentes de las Celulas del PTC.

articles.title: Clausurada V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas de PTC
articles.content:
Clausurada V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas de PTC
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurada el dia 23 la V Conferencia de los Presidentes de las Celulas del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Los miembros del Consejo Ejecutivo del Comite Central del PTC, encabezados por el Presidente del PTC Kim Jong Un, aparecieron en la tribuna para dirigir la tercera jornada de la conferencia.
					
					Lo hicieron tambien los cuadros directivos del Partido en el centro y las provincias.
					
					El conclave continuo bajo la direccion del Presidente del PTC.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a los exitos, experiencias y lecciones adquiridos en el curso de formar a los militantes del partido y los trabajadores como verdaderos kimilsungistas y kimjongilistas y mejorar la funcion y el papel de las celulas del partido.
					
					Durante las intervenciones, fueron criticados los errores y desviaciones observados en los trabajos para mejorar la funcion y el papel de las celulas del partido.
					
					Tambien se hizo mencion de las medidas practicas para elevar el desempeno de los presidentes de las celulas en preparar todas ellas como filas leales que apoyen en la delantera la idea y la guia del CC del Partido.
					
					Se tomaron las decisiones de reforzar el papel de los presidentes de las celulas, en acato al proposito del CC del Partido que convoco esta conferencia, para hacer aporte activo a la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y dar buen impulso a la construccion de una potencia socialista.
					
					Kim Jong Un pronuncio un discurso historico en la ocasion.
					
					Una vez concluido el discurso, todos los participantes le aclamaron con hospitalidad.
					
					Acto seguido, el pronuncio las palabras de clausura.

articles.title: Cancilleria coreana rechaza "resolucion de sancion" no.2397 de CS de la ONU
articles.content:
Cancilleria coreana rechaza "resolucion de sancion" no.2397 de CS de la ONU
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC hizo publica hoy la siguiente declaracion:
					Tan aturdido ante el logro de la gran causa historica del perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC, EE.UU. recrudece mas que nunca la campana de sancion y presion, sin precedente en la historia.
					
					Cuestionando el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM "Hwasong-15" de la RPDC, EE.UU. volvio a inventar el dia 23 la "resolucion de sancion" no.2397 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, igual al bloqueo economico total a la RPDC.
					
					Rechazamos totalmente el presente documento fabricado por EE.UU y sus fuerzas satelites, calificandolo de una violacion flagrante a la soberania de la RPDC y el acto de guerra que vulnera la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					A fin de defender la soberania del pais y la integridad territorial y la vida pacifica del pueblo desde la politica de chantaje nuclear y la amenaza nuclear del imperialismo norteamericano y garantizar fidedignamente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo, hemos logrado gran causa de perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, superando todas las pruebas multiples aun en medio de las vicisitudes de toda indole de la historia.
					
					Como hemos reiterado en varias ocasiones, nuestras armas nucleares fueron desarrolladas justamente, fuera del Tratado de No Proliferacion de Armas Nucleares, para dar punto final a la politica hostil y el chantaje nuclear de EE.UU., razon por la cual el disuasivo autodefensivo no contraviene a cualesquier leyes internacionales.
					
					A traves de las pasadas confrontaciones antiyanquis, hemos adquirido una veracidad de que hay que fortalecer por todos los medios el poderoso disuasivo nuclear para frustrar las maquinaciones de EE.UU. que se dedica a la amenaza militar en dondequiera que se encuentre por alcanzar su sueno ilusorio de la hegemonia mundial, preconizando la doctrina "America es primera" basada en la fuerza.
					
					Seria una gran equivocacion si el pais americano piensa que podria impedir con la caduca "sancion" el avance victorioso del pueblo coreano que llevo a feliz termino la gran causa historica del perfeccionamiento de fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, la de conversion del pais en potencia coheteril, capaces de hacer frente a cualesquier guerras nucleares de EE.UU.
					
					EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras no deben olvidar ni un momento la existencia de nuestro pais, surgido como Estado estrategico capaz de imponer a EE.UU. la amenaza nuclear real.
					
					Si quiere vivir en tranquilo, EE.UU. debe abolir su politica hostil a la RPDC, aprender el modo de coexistir con nosotros equipados con armas nucleares y liberarse cuanto antes de la ilusion vana de que la RPDC podria renunciar acaso sus armas nucleares, desarrolladas y perfeccionadas a duras penas.
					
					Los paises que votaron a favor de la "resolucion" se responsabilizaran de todas las consecuencias originadas por ese "documento" y ajustaremos sin falta las cuentas por el respecto.
					
					Nadie puede doblegar la voluntad del pueblo coreano que no se desespera ni teme ante las dificultades y desafios en el camino de su avance, sino confia en el radiante futuro.
					
					Seguiremos centuplicando el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa para lograr el equilibrio sustancial de fuerzas con el imperio, a fin de erradicar de raiz la amenaza nuclear y las campanas hostiles de EE.UU.
					
					Aunque EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles hagan esfuerzos desesperados, la RPDC, que avanza con la invencible unidad monolitica cuyo centro es el gran Dirigente, el poderio militar sin rivales y el autofortalecimiento, quedara como potencia y baluarte de la independencia, la autarquia y la autodefensa.

articles.title: Acto central por centenario de natalicio de Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Acto central por centenario de natalicio de Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el centesimo aniversario de natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, las entidades de masas, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los profesores, empleados y matriculados de la Escuela Revolucionaria Mangyongdae, los funcionarios y los benemeritos laborales de los organismos, las fabricas y las empresas en esta capital.
					
					En su informe, Yang Hyong Sop, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, dijo que la vida revolucionaria de la Heroina es la mas preciosa y noble de gran revolucionaria quien ofrendo todo lo suyo por la prosperidad y el radiante futuro del pais y la nacion, y prosiguio:
					
					Se registran un sinnumero de revolucionarias famosas en la historia de la humanidad, pero, no conoce a una revolucionaria extraordinaria y patriota verdadera como la Heroina quien realizo hazanas grandiosas y valiosas.
					
					La mas grande de las proezas de la Heroina es que ella ha creado el valioso ejemplo y la tradicion de la fidelidad al lider a ser materializados generacion tras generacion por los revolucionarios coreanos.
					
					La Heroina libero con fusiles a la patria en acato a la orientacion del Presidente e hizo gran contribucion a la preparacion de la firme base militar de la construccion de la patria prospera, he aqui sus inmortales hazanas acumuladas para la patria y la revolucion.
					
					En el camino inexplorado de la construccion de la patria, la Heroina llamo a todo el pueblo a la construccion de nueva patria, en acato a la idea y el proposito del Presidente.
					
					La mas distinguible de sus hazanas realizadas para la patria y la revolucion es haber enaltecido al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como el Sol de futuro, ofreciendo asi al pueblo coreano las fortunas de tener de generacion y generacion al lider y el General.
					
					Al finalizar, asevero que seran inmortales, junto con la causa de la construccion de potencia socialista del Juche, la vida revolucionaria y las hazanas de lucha de la Heroina quien dedico todo lo suyo por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
